description:
~~ Biscuit mania Match 3 Puzzle For FREE ~~

Biscuit Mania is a match three game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. Match cute biscuit's aliments. It is a nonstop blitz! Explore our game’s deep challenge and grow your mind beyond imagination. All your scores is saved in Game Center Leader-boards: Try to beat all other players around the whole world!
It is not only fun, it's fun of fun Match Three Game!
So, Always play from your heart!

Features:
> cute graphics, cool animation & Best Sound effects!
> endless fun for all ages.
> Many powerful items to help you win levels.
> Multiple game levels.
> Best Fun For Your Pass-Time!

Why are you waiting! Download Now & Start Your Fun!!!
